skills.name: Guidance 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP = 100%, infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

skills.name: Guidance 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% HP, infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

skills.name: Guidance 3
skills.effect: Infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

skills.name: Hardy Bearing 1
skills.effect: Disables unit's skills that change attack priority. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, disables foe's skills that change attack priority.

skills.name: Hardy Bearing 2
skills.effect: Disables unit's skills that change attack priority. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, disables foe's skills that change attack priority.

skills.name: Hardy Bearing 3
skills.effect: Disables unit's and foe's skills that change attack priority.

skills.name: Heavy Blade 1
skills.effect: If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+5, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

skills.name: Heavy Blade 2
skills.effect: If unit's Atk ≥ foe's Atk+3, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

skills.name: Heavy Blade 3
skills.effect: If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

skills.name: Hone Atk 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+2 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hone Atk 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+3 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hone Atk 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Atk+4 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+2 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hone Spd 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+3 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hone Spd 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+4 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: Iote's Shield
skills.effect: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.

skills.name: Live to Serve 1
skills.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = 50% of HP restored to target.

skills.name: Live to Serve 2
skills.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = 75% of HP restored to target.

skills.name: Live to Serve 3
skills.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = HP restored to target.

skills.name: Múspellflame
skills.effect: Reduces damage dealt to unit to 0.

skills.name: Obstruct 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

skills.name: Obstruct 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

skills.name: Obstruct 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

skills.name: Panic Ploy 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-5 into penalties through their next actions.

skills.name: Panic Ploy 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-3 into penalties through their next actions.

skills.name: Panic Ploy 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP < unit's HP into penalties through their next actions.

skills.name: Phantom Spd 1
skills.effect: If a skill compares unit's Spd to a foe's or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +5.

skills.name: Phantom Spd 2
skills.effect: If a skill compares unit's Spd to a foe's or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +8.

skills.name: Phantom Spd 3
skills.effect: If a skill compares unit's Spd to a foe's or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +10.

skills.name: Poison Strike 1
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 4 damage to foe after combat.

skills.name: Poison Strike 2
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe after combat.

skills.name: Poison Strike 3
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.

skills.name: Quick Riposte 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

skills.name: Quick Riposte 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 80% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

skills.name: Quick Riposte 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

skills.name: Quickened Pulse
skills.effect: At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown count-1.

skills.name: Res Ploy 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Res-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

skills.name: Res Ploy 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

skills.name: Res Ploy 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

skills.name: Res Tactic 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Res+2 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

skills.name: Res Tactic 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

skills.name: Res Tactic 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, grants Res+6 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.
